extended:
Wolf in the Breast by Evren - really different, somewhat AU take on post-game events. Solas returns to Skyhold with a bunch of extremely pissed-off elven gods hot on his trail. extended:
Elvhenan Arises series by evelynwaaaaah - this is a very lengthy series that is currently engrossed in a Cullen/OFC subplot, but it's explored post-game Solas a lot in earlier installments and seems likely to get back to that topic in the future. Of the current stories in the series, "A Wealth of Sorrows" is probably closest to what you want. http://archiveofourown.org/series/242476
